description.sun-moon:
The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s
recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.
effect.shortEffect: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
